body: This is goddam great, the best longform chronicle of pure debauchery in ages. Decent writing, great art, appealing character & situations, some genuinely funny comedy, and TONS of filthy hott seggs. I have no idea why so many of you losers are complaining about the ending, though. The ending is perfect! It totally fits her character and what came before. I mean, this whole thing is *her* story, right? She's the slut-hero MC. The men hardly even matter. So why shouldn't she get the ending -- and the sex -- that she really she wants? ... Best of the best, 10 out of fucking 10
Bruh so she likes cuckolding her husband 🤦🏽‍♂️
its predictable coz of cuzukago. but it is still not full tankoubon yet?

this is Will Smith backstory, anyway for anyone didn't understand what she wants that whore gets excited when she cheating on her husband, that's why she didn't feel good when he approved on her relationship with Tanaka, she said i realized the stimulus that i wanted and she need the pathetic husband to cheat without consequences
When I get out of my battery, prison, thingy I will personally wipe out NTR from this world...join us....

The excitement pretty much, women who cheat often do so because it brings "excitement" to their lives. The only way they realize what they're giving up is when the husband ditches them, mainly because their safety net is gone and the chances of the other guy staying with them is practically zero.
So what was it that she actually wanted?
The only bad NTR are those where the MC is the one getting his girl fucked.

Wow this dude is Ace as heck. I really don't feel bad about the cheating, because it doesn't seem like he cared about sex at all, while she clearly does. Should have been something they learned before they got married, unfortunate they didn't. 

Also, I think this was written by an actual woman, because I don't think any male ero mangaka would consider the adverse effects of a morning after pill.

This makes sense. Often its the cheating itself that excites people rather than approved swinging. You feel more powerful by breaking rules that are not supposed to be broken, whereas approved swinging just makes you, especially a woman look cheap. There is no accomplishment for a woman to get dick but doing it behind partner's back gives a sense of accomplishment.
Damn, that's pretty fucked up lmao. Real question: are there people like this irl, as in they purely get off on cheating, no matter who it is? Who am I kidding, of course there is LMFAOOOOOO
